reviews.review_text: I love me those astrological matches. I know it’s a bunch of bull for some, but I appreciate that somebody remembered to put that in a dating site!

Flirting was much more outrageous in my time, but this sending flirts thingy caught my attention. It’s a great way to attract someone’s attention. I am not very forward, so this slow paced atmosphere really agrees with me

I love that someone acknowledged that seniors could use dating sites too. Older people aren’t so keen on going out, so this site is perfect for me. I get to meet women while not moving my sometimes very painful hip. Couldn’t ask for anything more, thanks!

I think this site could be more colorful. I like the different features, and so far the instant match one has proved to be the best. A few times I couldn’t message my match, I don’t know why. When I highlighted my profile, nothing much happened, but it did look better. There’s room for better, but this is good enough as well.

It could be my username or the photo of my good side, but I’ve had a lot of interesting matches. If someone told me that I would be using some dating site daily, I would never believe them. Thanks for proving me wrong, I guess.
I just signed up a few days ago, but boy is it fun! So many single ladies, so little time, I better start sending those flirts.
